content: BALAJI SAI CHARAN JALUKURU has 4+ years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer at Zensark Technologies Pvt Ltd in Hyderabad, Telangana, India. During his tenure, he pioneered the development and deployment of Swaasa, an AI-powered platform for respiratory health assessments using advanced cough sound analysis. He implemented cutting-edge deep learning architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Tabular) and scalable solutions using AWS and AWS SageMaker, delivering 94% accuracy in diagnosing respiratory conditions. Additionally, he led and mentored a team of 9 ML engineers, streamlining model development and deployment through robust CI/CD pipelines utilizing Jenkins and GitLab. He enhanced scalability, automation, and operational efficiency in delivering deep learning solutions for healthcare. His work at Zensark Technologies Pvt Ltd earned him recognition as a finalist for the prestigious National Aegis Graham Bell Award for leadership and innovation in applying AI to healthcare.
